alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 27 at 9:51AM MDT until March 27 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, especially in Davis County. * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected through the morning commute, particularly for Davis and Salt Lake Counties. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will taper off through about noon today, however, there is a 15 percent chance that snowfall lingers through 1PM today.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley
